name: FShapedTextOptions
doc:
Common data for all widgets that use shaped text.
Contains the common options that should be exposed for the underlying Slate widget.

TextShapingMethod: Which text shaping method should the text within this widget use? (unset to use the default returned by GetDefaultTextShapingMethod)
TextFlowDirection: Which text flow direction should the text within this widget use? (unset to use the default returned by GetDefaultTextFlowDirection)
